sec.title: Practical examples in planning
sec.p: Clause xx of the UNI/PdR 125:2022 “Guidelines on the management system for gender equality which provides the adoption of specific KPIs (Key Performance Indicator) relating to gender equality policies in organizations” provides an example in planning:

list-item.p: identification of company processes related to the identified issues concerning gender equality;
identification of strengths and weaknesses with respect to the issues;
definition of the actions decided to fill the gaps;
definition, frequency and responsibility for monitoring the defined KPIs (see point 5).

sec.p: The strategic plan shall be shared by the management and kept updated over time. Based on the size of the organization, the strategic plan may have greater or lesser complexity, ⏎ considering also the need to define the frequency of periodic monitoring of the applicable KPIs, as set out in point 5.
